metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4502 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in the parse_notify function in sgminer before 4.2.2, cgminer before 4.3.5, and BFGMiner before 4.1.0 allow remote pool servers to have unspecified impact via a (1) large or (2) negative value in the Extranonc2_size parameter in a mining.subscribe response and a crafted mining.notify request.

criterions.comment: bfgminer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
cgminer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
